properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_ID , N.ENROLL_DATE , COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE N.DELETE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND DELETE_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT USER_ID , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , N.ENROLL_DATE , N.MODIFY_DATE , COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND N.DELETE_STATUS = 'N'
